selective.zhcn_desc:
选择性轰炸只针对军事设施，避免不必要的平民伤亡。
-对§Y军团§!造成§Y中度§!伤害
-对§Y星球§!造成§Y中度§!伤害
-对§Y人口§!造成§E轻度§!伤害
-§R不会§!轰炸不设防的星球
-§R不会§!消灭最后的§Y$MIN_POPS$§!个人口
selective.en_desc:
Selective Bombardment targets only identified military sites, taking care to avoid needless civilian casualties.
- §YModerate§! damage to §YArmies§!
- §YModerate§! damage to §YPlanet§!
- §ELight§! damage to §YPops§!
- Will §RNOT§! bombard undefended planets
- Will §RNOT§! kill the last §Y$MIN_POPS$§! Pops

raiding.en_desc:
Raiding Bombardment targets enemy population centers with specialized raiding craft that scoop up their people and bring them back to our worlds to put them to work.
- §ELight§! damage to §YArmies§!
- §ELight§! damage to §YPlanet§!
